name: Abraham Lincoln
famous_phrases: I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true.
Determine that the thing can and shall be done and then... find the way.

name: Mahatma Gandhi
famous_phrases: The future depends on what we do in the present.
Hate the sin, love the sinner.

name: Winston Churchill
famous_phrases: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
If you're going through hell, keep going.

name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
famous_phrases: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
The country needs... bold, persistent experimentation.

name: Nelson Mandela
famous_phrases: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

name: Martin Luther King Jr.
famous_phrases: I have a dream.
Love is mankind's most potent weapon for personal and social transformation.

name: Mother Teresa
famous_phrases: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.

name: Xi Jinping
famous_phrases: The Chinese nation has stood up, grown rich, and is becoming strong.

name: Vladimir Putin
famous_phrases: Whoever does not miss the Soviet Union has no heart. Whoever wants it back has no brain.

name: Joseph Stalin
famous_phrases: The only real power comes out of a long rifle.

name: Vladimir Lenin
famous_phrases: There are decades where nothing happens; and there are weeks where decades happen.

name: Ali Khamenei
famous_phrases: America is the great Satan.

name: Elon Musk
famous_phrases: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
I think it’s possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.

name: Satya Nadella
famous_phrases: Our industry does not respect tradition—it respects innovation.
We need to be willing to lean into ambiguity.

name: Tim Cook
famous_phrases: We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right.
You can focus on things that are barriers or you can focus on scaling the wall.

name: Neal Keny-Guyer
famous_phrases: Local leadership is the key to sustainable change.

name: Dianne Calvi
famous_phrases: Empowering local communities drives lasting impact.

name: George Soros
famous_phrases: I’m not better than the next trader, just quicker to admit I’m wrong.
An open society is a society which allows its members the greatest possible degree of freedom.

name: Jensen Huang
famous_phrases: The future is AI—it’s not a question of if, but how fast.
We’re always one generation away from changing the world.

name: Lisa Su
famous_phrases: Execution is everything—vision without execution is just a dream.
We compete by innovating relentlessly.

name: Mary Barra
famous_phrases: We’re not just building cars; we’re building the future of mobility.
Do what’s right, even when it’s hard.

name: Jamie Dimon
famous_phrases: You don’t run a business on hope; you run it on reality.
Leadership is about making tough calls and owning them.

name: Brian Moynihan
famous_phrases: Responsible growth is about doing right by our clients and communities.
Trust is earned through consistent action.
